data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Mechanical engineering technology is an applied science that is generally pursued after high school and focuses on the design, development, manufacture, and servicing of engineered devices and systems. The ____ includes ____ skills ____ concepts ____ in ____ such ____ mechanical ____, thermodynamics, ____ statistics. As an associate degree or bachelor of science degree program, mechanical engineering technology can lay the groundwork for a job in the manufacturing industry or in research fields such as industrial engineering or design research.
data.partBlankContent: Mechanical engineering technology is an applied science that is generally pursued after high school and focuses on the design, development, manufacture, and servicing of engineered devices and systems. The fi___ includes prac_____ skills a__ concepts lea____ in cou____ such a_ mechanical des___, thermodynamics, a__ statistics. As an associate degree or bachelor of science degree program, mechanical engineering technology can lay the groundwork for a job in the manufacturing industry or in research fields such as industrial engineering or design research.
data.answer: 机械工程技术是一门应用科学，一般在高中毕业后追求，重点是设计，开发，制造和服务的工程设备和系统。该领域包括在机械设计、热力学和统计学等课程中学到的实用技能和概念。作为一个副学士学位或理学学士学位项目，机械工程技术可以为在制造业或研究领域的工作打下基础，如工业工程或设计研究。
